import React from "react"; import { makeStyles } from "@material-ui/core/styles"; import { Grid, TextField, Button, Paper, Typography, FormControlLabel, Checkbox, Box, Avatar } from "@material-ui/core"; import LockOutlinedIcon from "@material-ui/icons/LockOutlined"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { hakdog } from "assets"; const useStyles = makeStyles(theme => ({ root: { height: "93.5vh" }, image: { backgroundImage: `url(${hakdog})`, backgroundRepeat: "no-repeat", backgroundColor: theme.palette.type === "light" ? theme.palette.grey[50] : theme.palette.grey[900], backgroundSize: "cover", backgroundPosition: "center" }, paper: { margin: theme.spacing(8, 4), display: "flex", flexDirection: "column", alignItems: "center" }, avatar: { margin: theme.spacing(1), backgroundColor: theme.palette.secondary.main }, form: { width: "100%", // Fix IE 11 issue. marginTop: theme.spacing(1) }, submit: { margin: theme.spacing(3, 0, 2) } })); function Login() { const classes = useStyles(); return (
Sign in
} label="Remember me" /> Forgot password? {"Don't have an account? Sign Up"}
); } export default Login;
